gmScreen.Title: GM Screen
gmScreen.EmptyCellHint: Drag and Drop a Journal Entry, Rollable Table, Actor, or Item from either the World or a Compendium.

gm-screen-config.Name: Grid Tabs
gm-screen-config.Label: Tabs Config
gm-screen-config.Hint: Add, Remove, and Update Grid Tabs here.

columns.Name: Columns
columns.Hint: How many columns do you want? Changing this may require a grid clear.

rows.Name: Rows
rows.Hint: How many rows do you want? Changing this may require a grid clear.

right-margin.Name: Drawer Only: Right Margin
right-margin.Hint: Sets the offset from the sidebar to the right side of the GM Screen. This number affects the maximum possible width of the screen in drawer display mode.

drawer-height.Name: Drawer Only: Height
drawer-height.Hint: Sets the height of the GM Screen in drawer display mode.

drawer-width.Name: Drawer Only: Width
drawer-width.Hint: Calculated as a percentage of the available screen width after the sidebar and right margin are taken into account.

drawer-opacity.Name: Drawer Only: Opacity
drawer-opacity.Hint: Controls how opaque the drawer is.

reset.Name: Reset
reset.Hint: Clear the Grid entries. This action can not be undone.

display-as-drawer.Name: Display as Drawer
display-as-drawer.Hint: Display the GM Screen as a drawer on the bottom of the screen, as opposed to a normal dialog. If you want to use PopOut, set this to false.

warnings.noGrids: Your GM has not shared any GM Screen Grids.

clearConfirm.Title: Clear Grid
clearConfirm.Content: Are you sure you want to clear the grid entries? This action can not be undone.

errors.empty: Cannot save the grid with no tabs.

entitySheet.Label: GM Screen Sheet
entitySheet.Hint: Set the sheet used specifically on GM Screen for this item.
